Actions.Text:
#!/bin/bash

# Get the current app's bundle ID
current_app_bundle_id=$(osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get bundle identifier of first process whose frontmost is true')

# Find the ten most recent directories in recordings folder
recent_dirs=$(find "$HOME/Documents/superwhisper/recordings" -type d -exec ls -td {} + 2>/dev/null | head -n 10)

# Look for output.wav in each directory, starting from the most recent
output_file=""
for dir in $recent_dirs; do
    if [ -f "$dir/output.wav" ]; then
        output_file="$dir/output.wav"
        break
    fi
done

# If output.wav was found, open it with superwhisper
if [ -n "$output_file" ]; then
    # Open the file with superwhisper
    open -a "superwhisper" "$output_file"
    
    # Return focus to the previous app
    osascript -e "tell application id \"$current_app_bundle_id\" to activate"
else
    echo "No output.wav found in the ten most recent recording directories."
fi
